setup_script_description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, hides the previous/next arrow buttons and sets focus on a link after the 'Year' spin button
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Year' spin button.
output_assertions: Name of the group is conveyed as: 'Choose a Date current value is Friday, March nineteenth, 2021'
